about_the_game:
Pixelmancy is a fast-paced, magic-infused bullet heaven action-roguelite where you step into the shoes of a powerful wizard. As demonic forces swarm, your goal is to collect loot, unlock legendary magical staves, tomes, and grow ever stronger with each encounter.

Survive relentless waves of enemies as you cast powerful spells and gain game-breaking upgrades. Face off against monstrous minibosses, partake in challenging events and refine your magical arsenal to unleash unimaginable power.

Explore beautifully crafted pixel environments, where every playthrough offers unique challenges and rewards. The choices you make and the spells you wield will determine your survival. Are you ready to become the ultimate wizard and slay the most powerful demons?

Key Features:


• Bullet Heaven Action: Battle endless waves of enemies in chaotic, fast-paced combat.

• Unlock Legendary Weapons: Discover powerful staves and tomes, each with its own unique ability.

• Roguelite Progression: Upgrade your account to become stronger each time you play.

• Dynamic Events: Take on minibosses and participate in special events for rare rewards.

• Pixel Art Magic: Enjoy beautifully pixelated visuals with detailed environments and spell effects.

• Replayability: No two runs are the same—new upgrades, enemies, and challenges await every time you play.


Master the magical arts, obliterate hordes of enemies, and ascend to wizardly greatness in Pixelmancy!

content_descriptors.notes: Pixelmancy contains fantasy violence, including battles against demons, blood effects, and visual depictions of defeated enemies. There are no depictions of sexual content, drug use, or explicit themes. The game focuses on magical combat, with stylized pixel art showing mild blood effects upon enemy defeat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card or better

short_description: Pixelmancy is a bullet heaven action-roguelite where you play as a wizard battling demon hordes. Unlock legendary staves and tomes, upgrade your spell and character strength, and survive waves of enemies. Face minibosses, complete events, and grow stronger with every battle!
